颲字的基本解释

颲
liè
（风）猛烈：“风颲霆飞。”

颲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liè］
［《廣韻》良薛切，入薛，來。］
(1)狂风。
(2)风凛冽貌。

颲字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【風字部】　颲； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1412第25
【唐韻】良嶭切【集韻】力櫱切【韻會】力薛切，?音列。【玉篇】颲，惡風也。【廣韻】風雨暴至。　又【韻會】通作烈。【書·舜典】烈風雷雨勿迷。　又通作列。【前漢·王莽傳】列風。【註】與烈同。本作列。　【正字通】隷作?，字彙沿俗作颲，非。列字从歺作。

颲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
颲字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Tellurium
liè
(Wind) violently: "The wind is flying."
Tellurium
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liè］
["Guangyun" Liang Xue cut, enter Xue, come. ]
(1) Strong wind.
(2) Windy appearance.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Feng Zi Department】　颲; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 1412 to 25
[Tang Yun] Liangjiqie [Jiyun] Lixueqie [Yunhui] Lixueqie,? Sound list. [Jade articles] Tellurium, the bad wind is also. [Guangyun] The storm is coming.　[Yunhui] Tong Zuolie. 【Book·Shun Code】Don’t get lost in strong winds and thunderstorms.　Through the list again. [Previous Han·Wang Mang Biography] Lie Feng. [Note] With Lietong. This is a column.　【Zhengzitong】The official name is?, the vocabulary follows the custom as tellurium, non. Column characters are made from Xiao.
